meta.name: Rhiley Code Dataset
meta.description: Real working TypeScript/React code examples for Rhiley AI — every example has 3 variations

examples.name: SaaS Hero with Gradient
examples.designNotes: Uses Fraunces display font for dramatic impact. ChromaFlow-inspired gradient background. Staggered text reveal with spring physics. CTA button has magnetic hover effect.

variations.name: Dark Gradient

examples.name: Analytics Dashboard
examples.designNotes: Sidebar layout with collapsible nav. KPI cards with trend indicators. Area chart + bar chart. Dark glass-card style.

examples.name: Feature Section with Animation
examples.designNotes: Bento grid feature layout. Each card reveals on scroll with stagger. Mix of large and small cards for visual rhythm.
